definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: From which dynasty was the blue---flower porcelain plate in the Hall of Happiness and Longevity left?
sentences.chinese: 頤和園樂壽堂內的青花大磁盤是哪個朝代的遺物？

sentences.english: These superhuman skills had at times been rewarded or punished by Chinese dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 這些超人的技能在中國的不同朝代曾被褒獎或貶抑。

sentences.english: Mystical bloodlines are only important when continuing a dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 血統只在延續朝代的時候起作用。

sentences.english: Although the country is the same one, but it is two dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 雖然是同一個國號，卻是兩個朝代。

sentences.english: Da Qu had been a main music performance pattern in different dynasties since Han and Wei.
sentences.chinese: 漢魏以來，大麴一直是各朝代音樂文化的主流形態。

sentences.english: Sometimes there are multiple official history of the same dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 有時一個朝代甚至會有多部官方史書。

sentences.english: In the Chinese history of traditional opera there are different performing systems in different dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 在中國戲曲史上，不同朝代有不同的演出體制。

sentences.english: But the dynamic dynasty has gone.
sentences.chinese: 但有生氣的朝代已經結束。

sentences.english: I am not going to ask you to learn by heart the 24 or 25 dynasties of China.
sentences.chinese: 我可無意要求大家把中國二十四五個朝代都背記下來。

sentences.english: Various dynasty have the different style rimmer knife.
sentences.chinese: 各朝代均有不同風格的長刀。

sentences.english: Mystical bloodlines are only important when continuing a dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 血統只在連續朝代的時候起作用。

sentences.english: Frequent burst of peasant uprisings showed that the dynasties' days were numbered.
sentences.chinese: 農民起義頻頻爆發，表明這個朝代的大數已盡。

sentences.english: No dynasty had been so cosmopolitan and outward-looking.
sentences.chinese: 沒有哪個朝代如此熱衷於漂泊和睜眼看世界。

sentences.english: The Qing Dynasty is our country literary inquisition most dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清代是我國文字獄最多的朝代。

sentences.english: Most of them were cast in Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代是鑄造鐵獅子最多的朝代。

sentences.english: At the same time, they reconstructed climate patterns over the period under review.
sentences.chinese: 同時，他們重構了那些朝代的氣候模式。

definition: Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
